entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [UITesting] Add device logs to published bits #19038
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • CollectionView snaps randomly when we give horizontal and vertical spacing #19037
  • Appium occasionally fails to install #19036
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Publish error when using generic class for DataType of DataTemplate in XAML #19035
  • ERROR WHILE COMPLETING THE .NET MUAI #19034
  • Maui Blazor Android cannot force loading addresses with query strings #19033
  • UnFocus does not work on Entries inside CollectionView. #19032

Closed

  • MAUI ios app not working/crashing after deployed to Testflight #19026

PullRequests

Updated

  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D6 #18728
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G1 #18616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D9 #18762
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18970
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
